message_1: "What is the balanced chemical equation for the reaction of hydrochloric acid (HCl) with sodium bicarbonate (NaHCO3) resulting in the evolution of carbon dioxide gas (CO2)?"
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the reaction of hydrochloric acid (HCl) with sodium bicarbonate (NaHCO3) resulting in the evolution of carbon dioxide gas (CO2) is:

HCl (aq) + NaHCO3 (aq) â†’ NaCl (aq) + H2O (l) + CO2 (g)
